page.title: 15LANGUAGE
page.content:
Here are ten sayings collected by a group of children from Chesterfield.
{1. Eesezeeantadit,burraberreeaz...He {says he hasn't had it, but I bet he {has. 2. Shifttheesen!..Would you mind {moving? 3. Thawantsa wesh thi eeroles {aht!..You should wash out your ears. {4. Oowurriwee,wurreeweeisen?.. Who was {he with, was he by himself? 5. Geeit {t'mester..Give it to the gentleman. {6. Supwithee?..What is the matter with {you? 7. Tintintin.. It isn't in the {tin. 8. Azanyonya Gorranyonya?..Has {anyone brought any with them? 9. Iz {funizat int cubberd..He has found his {hat in the cupboard. 10.Gerritetten.. {Get it eaten.
